tilsdk.mock_robomaster.camera

Module Contents

Classes

Camera

Mock robomaster camera.
class tilsdk.mock_robomaster.camera.Camera(robot)

Mock robomaster camera.

read_cv2_image(timeout=3, strategy='pipeline')

Read image from robot camera.

For mock, gets image from simulator.

Parameters:

  • timeout (float) – Timeout value.

  • strategy (str) – Image acquisition strategy. For challenge, ‘newest’ should be used.

Returns:

img – cv2 image.

Return type:

ndarray
